channel.name: CGTN-Documentary En CN
channel.title: Today's Top Pick
channel.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

channel.name: CGTN-Documentary En CN
channel.title: Humanities and Geography
channel.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

channel.name: CGTN-Documentary En CN
channel.title: Living China
channel.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

channel.name: CGTN-Documentary En CN
channel.title: Special Edition
channel.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

channel.name: CGTN-Documentary En CN
channel.title: Journeys and Discoveries
channel.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.[(96057)]
